testimonial: Excellent- Oman Expedition Great experience - all the details went off exactly as planned. Well done!
author: Alan- Orlando

testimonial: Wonderful-Laos Expedition I most enjoyed my time away from the big towns and cities. Spending time in scenic mountains, and in small villages was the best part for me.
author: Suzanne Kirkham- Vancouver

testimonial: A+ Very caring and professional. We have traveled many times with different companies and find Sumit Pruthi to be the best trip leader we have ever had.
author: Elena- New York City

testimonial: Excellent- Iran Experience The people of Iran were wonderful, and I loved the itinerary off the beaten track as well as amazing sites well known every day was great Sumit was amazing. I've been to over 150 countries not just on tours and he was one of the best ever.
author: Richard - California

testimonial: Super!!Super!!- Nepal Experience First time with your company, I hope to come on future trips with MiddleEast Routes because of your stimulating itineraries. This trip was exceptionally well guided.
author: Kate - Colorado

testimonial: Really one of the best!! This young man gets it and does a great read on people and super attentive to all of us! He was most helpful with over-counter medications, snacks and most informative on Philippines and loved how the other tour guides greeted him, he was first class
author: Martha- Melbourne
